title: The Story About My Ex-Girlfriend's Younger Brother Being Cute
description:
Takuya was dumped by his childhood friend, who had been dating with him for 6 years. Then, he was contacted by Naoki, his EX's little brother. 

[u][b]Spanish / Español:[/b][/u]  [spoiler]Takuya fue abandonado por su amiga de la infancia, Quién habia estado saliendo con el por 6 años. Entonces,
él fue contactado por Naoki, El hermano menor de su Ex.[/spoiler]
